messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

project variance area of the monthly report feature is stuck with input comments dating back oracle sent thursday important release monthly reports hi could you route looks like variance area monthly report feature stuck with input comments dating back period we were using section review variance analysis build monthly reports could you investigate here screen capture regards sent tuesday december important release monthly reports dear inform you there release delivers monthly report functionality you whom addressed mainly aimed input review please below what does mean include apologies for please thru steps follow order complete monthly report reflected under your planning task list tasks note we recommend use default browser when working with fusion we added couple forms be source feed printable report you can these under data entry operation plan monthly report comments please follow forms instructions can be accessed by clicking button we added here details instructions how use each particular form please take note printed monthly report pack section highlight what comments data form be printed report print your monthly report report navigate reports section your dashboard reports locate pack click icon note you also each report printable item moment allow hide certain report elements thus you these listed well please use pack dialog click continue prompt up select using view or type your code you want print report note if you run report you some your comments displayed because comments you added where stored against different point view please make generally you comment variances deltas against you your if you be using view selection type option please use search functionality for your code make you your selection by moving member right click then your report be generated displayed browser you can download send your manager for review or print report during your review sessions note current report only covers current cycle today period vs period we still working creating historic report pack we can print reports for previous cycles well we release came bit late during monthly forecasting cycle but note we worked really hard have implemented was possible given workload fronts thus we kindly ask you go ahead fill your variance comments generate reports use tool for your review meetings with please be informed these reports also be used documentation case we be requested by auditors therefore inputting meaningful commentary about monthly variances changes your future months forecast etc should be treated important task case questions or clarifications required please contact thank you for your collaboration kind regards information confidential be legally privileged intended solely for addressee any opinions expressed mine necessarily represent opinions susceptible interference if you intended recipient any disclosure copying or any action taken or omitted be taken reliance strictly prohibited be unlawful if you have received message

message.reasoning:
**Classifying IT Ticket**

I need to categorize an IT ticket based on a provided list of categories: "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," "Miscellaneous," "Storage," "Purchase," "Internal Project," and "Administrative rights." The ticket details mention issues with a "monthly report feature," input comments, and related aspects like "variance analysis" and "data entry." Given that this is related to a software feature, "Internal Project" seems like the best fit, while options like "Access" and "HR Support" don't apply.{"category":"Internal Project"}
